attributes.comment:
As a person who is currently going through the process of International Adoption, I
oppose the fee increases, specifically on forms I-600/600A N600 and Biometric
Fees. The adoption process is already a very expensive and hard thing to endure.
For many people who adopt internationally, it takes the financial help of friends
and family to help defray the costs to even make it somewhat affordable. Please
also consider the fact that international adoptions are a very long process, and
many times, families have to resubmit applications more than once because the
paperwork has expired. This causes adopting families to pay the fees at least
twice. Thank you for your consideration on this matter.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Paul Sinclair
